attributes.action: Set a dermarche for the Pakistani Government detialing the need for equal human rights for all irrespective of faith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The blasphemy Law of Pakistan section 298A and 295B&C is being used to settle personal vendettas, whichg in the last 2 months has seen over 14 incidents of violence meted out against Christian Communities.  In Gojra Pakistan a mob of 3000 Muslims burnt down 2 churches and 70 homes killing 9 people.  We ask that the Blasphemy law either provides universal protection to all faith, with better auditing of authorities involved in its practice or that the law be abrogated in its entirity.  More details to be found at 

http://britishpakistanichristian.blogspot.com/
